build().Description: Creates a @B_android#media#MediaMetadata_E@ instance with the specified fields.

MediaMetadata.Builder(android.media.Medi.Description: Create a Builder using a @B_android#media#MediaMetadata_E@ instance to set the initial values. All fields in the source metadata will be included in the new metadata. Fields can be overwritten by adding the same key.

ClassDesc: Use to build MediaMetadata objects. The system defined metadata keys must use the appropriate data type.
